entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:41 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 01:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow

Visibility: 2.4 km

Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
